name: Glitch (itch) (LouieLu, szhu005, YushenMa)
description:
Team work by Zhu Shidi, Ma Yushen and Zhang Lu.

By stepping on the first point, the second point appears. The dots guide the player through the scene by letting them manipulate the camera.

This could even be described as a game that is not really a game. What we are looking for more than a normal game is the new experience of navigating through the scenes: it's a magical, fun experience.
